name: Rush It! (Dev Penguin)
description:
Prepare to play this action packed hyper casual infinite runner.

Run as fast as you can through the ongoing traffic dying in the process. Can you survive while driving with only two buttons?

Controls

Left & Right arrows switches driving lanes.

Gameplay
  • Drive as fast as you can
  • Pick up boosts to double your score and speed for some time.
  • Do not do this at your home
  • Don't crash!

More to come!

Attributions

Code and Design. Dev Penguin

Art. LimboCO & Kenney

Music. Monplaisir &  LittleRobotSoundFactory

All rights reserved. Thank you for playing
